citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 to 12:30
pm on 20-AUG-18.
Knocking on door. Ring the bell, Blew the car horn, and call and leave a message.
